attributes.action: Leave the European Union with a No Deal
attributes.additional_details: Recent petitions call for Article 50 to be revoked or the process halted, this aims to give a fair balence to those views
attributes.background: It is asking the direct question of leaving without a deal in contrast to stopping the process

rejection.details:
Leave the EU Without a deal on April 12th               https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/248281 

Leave with No Deal if Parliament rejects the EU Withdrawal Agreement        https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234393
